events.description: Christian Yelich walks.
William Contreras pops out to second baseman Nico Hoerner. 1 out
Brewers challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was overturned: Mark Canha singles on a ground ball to third baseman Jeimer Candelario. Christian Yelich to 2nd.
Wild pitch by pitcher Justin Steele. Christian Yelich to 3rd. Mark Canha to 2nd.
Willy Adames lines out to second baseman Nico Hoerner. 2 outs

Nico Hoerner hit by pitch.
Ian Happ doubles (26) on a line drive to center fielder Joey Wiemer. Nico Hoerner to 3rd.
Cody Bellinger grounds out, second baseman Brice Turang to first baseman Mark Canha. Nico Hoerner scores. Ian Happ to 3rd. 2 outs
